summary: This mod adds 5 new Illusion spells to the game that allow you to alter the prices traders offer you.
descriptionHtml:
Description:
This is my first mod.

Adds 5 new spells to the game that allow you to alter the prices offered by the traders of Skyrim.
These spells fall under the illusion school and should be purchasable anywhere spells are sold.

Spells:
Novice: Haggler: 10% better prices for 30 seconds.
Apprentice: Barterer: 15% better prices for 30 seconds.
Adept: Silver Tongued: 20% better prices for 30 seconds.
Expert: Mercantilist: 25% better prices for 30 seconds.
Master: Master Tradesman: 30% better prices for 30 seconds.

Please inform me of any problems you encounter, I\'ll try my best to correct them!

You may alter, use, fix, or do whatever you want with this file as long as some credit is given to myself.

Installation: 
Drop the .esp into the Skyrim Data file [...\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data] and click the check box inside the the game menu.

Changes in 1.01:
Each level of spell now grows in increments of 5 instead of 10(10-15-20 etc.) to balance it out.(still Dual Castable)
A copy of each book can be found in the world space and not just on merchants.
All known spelling errors fixed.
author: The Solitary Drifter
